programme.title: Sesame Street S54
programme.desc: Elmo, Tamir, Charlie, Julia, and Cookie Monster are making self-portraits in the community garden with Kayla. Kayla guides them to look into the mirror and notice the beautiful things that make you, you! Everyone looks at themselves in the mirror and starts drawing what they see. They also learn their identity is about what you love to do. So, they add onto their self-portraits and then share their drawings with each other. Cookie Monster draws his blue fur, his googly eyes, and cookies. Charlie draws her blue eyes, curly blonde hair, tap shoes, and challah bread because it’s one of her favorite Jewish foods. Julia draws her straight hair, musical notes, paw prints, and her dog Rose. Elmo draws his red fur, orange nose, a piano, and watering a flower with Abby because being a kind neighbor is part of Elmo’s identity. Tamir draws his brown skin, coily hair, comic books, and some veggies as he loves gardening in the community garden. There are so many special things that make you, you!

programme.title: The Holdovers

programme.title: Land Of Bad
programme.desc: When a Delta Force team is ambushed in enemy territory, their only hope lies with an Air Force drone pilot to guide them through a brutal 48-hour battle for survival.

programme.title: How To Train Your Dragon

programme.title: Millers In Marriage
programme.desc: Three siblings navigate life’s next chapter in this heartfelt drama about love and second chances.

programme.title: Harry Potter And The Order Of The Phoenix
programme.desc: When a new professor's methods leave Hogwarts unprepared to fight the rising tide of evil, Harry teaches students how to defend against the dark arts.

programme.title: Furious 7
programme.desc: With a revenge-thirsty assassin hot on their heels, Dominic Toretto, Brian O'Conner and the rest of the crew come together as a team to protect their own.

programme.title: Despicable Me 3
programme.desc: Fired from the Anti-Villain League, Gru finds himself in a major identity crisis until the appearance of a mysterious stranger reminds him how good it feels to be bad.

programme.title: The Holdovers
programme.desc: A rebellious student, a notoriously disliked professor, and the school’s head chef form an unlikely bond, as they are the only one’s left on-campus for Christmas break, helping one another understand that they are not beholden to their past.

programme.title: Land Of Bad
programme.desc: When a Delta Force team is ambushed in enemy territory, their only hope lies with an Air Force drone pilot to guide them through a brutal 48-hour battle for survival.

programme.title: Metamorphosis
programme.desc: An evil spirit that changes faces infiltrates a family, placing one brother in danger while the other tries to save him.

programme.title: The Divine Move
programme.desc: Go player Tae-Seok is framed and imprisoned for his brother's death after losing a high-stakes game. After his sentence, he sets out for revenge against the underground gambler who destroyed his life.

programme.title: The Attorney
programme.desc: When tax attorney Song Woo-Suk agrees to defend a student activist who was arrested and tortured into giving a false confession, his entire life and worldview begin to change drastically.

programme.title: 0.0Mhz
programme.desc: A group of thrill seekers try to prove the existence of ghost by using radio frequency technology inside the notorious haunted asylum.

programme.title: Waiting For Rain
programme.desc: An unmotivated student regains his passion for life after exchanging letters with his childhood friend and promise to meet if it rains on December 31st each year.

programme.title: The Terror, Live
programme.desc: A newsman discovers he's been rigged with a bomb after he has an exclusive interview with a terrorist who blew up a bridge.

programme.title: Samjin Company English Class
programme.desc: In the mid-1990s in South Korea, three female office co-workers who enroll in English classes in hopes to advance their careers, struggle to expose the corruption inside their company.

programme.title: Shoot Me In The Heart
programme.desc: A young man develops schizophrenia after his mother's suicide. After he meets a kindred spirit at the psychiatric hospital, he forges a plan with the man to escape.

programme.title: The Tiger
programme.desc: While the Kingdom of Korea is under occupation by the Japanese, an old and experienced hunter is challenged by the hunt of the last tiger in the country.

programme.title: Toss Coin
programme.desc: A busker met a girl who makes decision through tossing a coin.

programme.title: Peninsula
programme.desc: Set four years after the zombie outbreak, a former soldier and his team return to the zombie-infested wastelands to retrieve a truck of money and try to escape from it alive.

programme.title: Montage
programme.desc: 5 days before the statute of limitations of a 15-year-old kidnapping case expires, a flower is left anonymously at the original crime scene. A few days later, a similar kidnapping takes place.

programme.title: Dr. Cheon And The Lost Talisman
programme.desc: Dr. Cheon is a fake exorcist who cannot see or hear any ghosts. One day, a woman comes to Dr. Cheon, asking him to save her possessed younger sister...

programme.title: The Suspect
programme.desc: Betrayed by his country, a North Korean agent escaped to South Korea in vengeance for his family, yet become the suspect of a homicide.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: "The crew tracks down the source of the havoc-wreaking robot “Qilin” and winds up trapped by Mr. Lung, the Minticon-using candymaker who disappeared in Season 1. While captive, Yi and the crew learn of a higher power known as the Great Watchers, and that Mr. Lung is furious at Yi for unwittingly replacing him as the GW-approved keeper of magical creatures. Saddled with these mind-blowing revelations, the crew must find a way to escape and stop Mr. Lung from using creature magic for evil."

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS
programme.desc: Eugene discovers the Lair and demands a dragon of his own.

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge
programme.desc: When Dagur the Deranged captures Gustav, it's up to Hiccup, Toothless and the Dragon Riders to get him back.

programme.title: Dragons: Riders of Berk
programme.desc: Hiccup tries to best Snotlout during the Thaw Games, the Vikings’ annual sports competition.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny
programme.desc: When Po and the kids stop for the night at an Inn, they meet a gang who wants to fight Po and end up down a path to uncovering Jindiao's evil plan

programme.title: Where's Wally?
programme.desc: The Wanderers receive a WanderPost with some odd news from paleontologist, WIZARD AMBER: living dinosaurs are roaming around Mongolia! Odlulu and Fritz are using the DINO KEY to get the ultimate pets: real dinosaurs! So Wally and Wenda must use their dino-knowledge to wrangle these prehistoric animals before they overrun all of Mongolia.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien
programme.desc: Julien’s former BFF, Rob, returns to lure the king away from his royal responsibilities and back to his crazy partying days.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods
programme.desc: When Grug takes Ugga hunting to find her inner growl again, she's as fierce as ever until coming face-to-face with a mom and baby too cute to catch.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free
programme.desc: Lucky enlists Abigail Turo Snips and their horses to help plan a surprise birthday party for Pru that goes disastrously wrong

programme.title: Dinotrux
programme.desc: Just as Ty Rux welcomes Garby, a loud and smelly Stegarbasaurus, to the crater, Revvit disappears and the gang embarks on a dangerous rescue mission.

programme.title: Voltron: Legendary Defender
programme.desc: When a Galra Commander infiltrates the castle and destroys its power crystal, the team must protect Voltron from falling into the wrong hands.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T.
programme.desc: The snails are invited to perform on a cruise ship and while onboard Turbo encounters a group of rodent pirates who challenge him to a race—loser has to walk the plank/When Turbo is knocked out before a big charity race, Skidmark creates a shell that allows the crew to race the unconscious Turbo with a remote control.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T.
programme.desc: The snails accidentally wake a group of cicadas from their hibernation and after the bugs begin eating the town's food supply the snails go to extreme measures to rid the city of the /A celebrity chef steals Tito's taco recipe and challenges the FAST crew to a relay race against his own group of copycat racing snails.

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse
programme.desc: The dollhouse is immersed in imaginative Wild West play with Sheriff Gabby, Sheriff Pandy, and CatRat the Bandit. Sheriff Gabby and Sheriff Pandy must safely deliver gold to the bank, but it gets confiscated by Bandit CatRat! They go on an adventure to get the gold back and restore order in the dollhouse.

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse
programme.desc: Gabby brings DJ Catnip a microphone for him to use in the big music show, but he has some terrible news: he lost his groove! Determined to help him get his groove back, Gabby and Pandy take him on a musical search through the dollhouse. As they go, Gabby uses the microphone to record sounds from the Gabby Cats’ everyday activities that culminate into a new song that gets DJ his groove back just in time for the show! In our Gabby Cat of the Day Segment, Gabby sings a song!

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: As a prank, George and Harold use Melvin's new animal hybrid invention to create a creature that's a cross between a butt and a fly. But some of the monster butt-erflies want to eat everything in sight- including the students hiding out in the school gym!

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib
programme.desc: On the hottest week of the year and a miserable time for babies, Boss and Tim infiltrates a country club with a very cool splash pad in order to find some way around their strict “no-babies” policy. Meanwhile, Banker Baby Benny visits the startup company to check on his investment. Tina has to cover up how the heat has split her coworkers into lawless factions fighting over a fan and a mist cooler.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree
programme.desc: While the parents are away, the kids are in charge of the tree house, but when the punch monkeys invade the house, the kids find themselves out of their element.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: On the brink of his highly-anticipated White Coat Ceremony at school, Jin proudly dons his new white doctor’s coat around town, unwittingly drawing the attention of a creature named Morty. After a slobbery lick from Morty, Jin turns invisible! As Jin frantically tries to become re-visible, he discovers that Morty is very pregnant! Ultimately, Jin foregoes his ceremony and instead delivers Morty’s five babies.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS
programme.desc: During an attempt to get displaced Fire Gronckles back to their native Fire Realm, D’Angelo makes a mistake by accidentally feeding them Catastrophic Quaken eggs.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On!
programme.desc: Satin and Chenille put on a fashion show to impress the trendsetter of Troll VillagePoppy and Branch start a massive villagewide pillow battle to determine who gets the pillow of destiny.

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse
programme.desc: When Gabby unboxes a suitcase and a hotel brochure, it’s time to take a trip to The Dollhouse Hotel! Hotel guests Gabby and Pandy check in with the Hotel Manager DJ Catnip then go to Mercat’s Spa and even order room service from Pillow Cat! For our Gabby Cat of the Day Segment, Pillow Cat sings a song!

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse
programme.desc: Huzzah! Gabby the Bold and Pandy the Purr-owd are Knights in Training, and they head into the dollhouse for the Royal Knighting Ceremony. But it turns out that someone's locked King Catnip in the tower and without him they'll have to cancel the Royal Knighting Ceremony! It's up to the Knights in Training to solve the mystery and save King Catnip by performing acts of knighthood. For our Cat of the Day, Pandy makes a shield craft!

programme.title: Team Zenko Go
programme.desc: When Rodney accidentally catches Sam when she falls from a tree and starts to believe he’s a hero TZG secretly follow him around town to make sure his clumsy hero-ing doesn’t go wrong. / When Lula and Luis want a clubhouse for the Squasher Fan Club, TZG secretly help fix up the shed in Luis’ backyard.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go
programme.desc: When various townsfolk report having lost soft belongings, TZG secretly investigates to discover thieving pigeon Yolanda had been building a nest for baby gophers. / When Ian’s lucky badminton racket goes missing, TZG secretly finds and returns it in time for a rematch against his toughest opponent.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders
programme.desc: The Riders have to save Elbone when he's swallowed by a giant Sea Gronckle, and Dak's awful cooking might be just the thing to do it.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders
programme.desc: At a big town festival, Magnus challenges Duggard in a competition to be chief of Huttsgalor! Can the Riders help their friend keep his helmet?

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal
programme.desc: Kelps learns about memory spark in an attempt to relive a memory of his grandmother. / Kelp and the underwater gang put on a show to showcase their imaginary sparks. As she practices, however, Scallop becomes convinced her tusk has a real spark!

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal
programme.desc: Kelp is excited to celebrate his right of passage, breaking the ice with his horn. But when he struggles to break the ice like other narwhals, he is determined to do it “the Kelp way.”

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots
programme.desc: Puss is terrified by an invasion by a swarm of bees, which only the hippy-like “Piper” can control with her magic flute.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots
programme.desc: Just as Puss is training the orphans to protect San Lorenzo, El Moco storms into town and cat-naps the swashbuckling hero.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: Captain Underpants becomes a wanted man in underwear when footage surfaces of a robber who looks exactly like him. George and Harold, positive it's an impostor, try to track down the perp and bring him to justice. But can the boys do this before Captain Underpants is found guilty?

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: As a prank, George and Harold use Melvin's new animal hybrid invention to create a creature that's a cross between a butt and a fly. But some of the monster butt-erflies want to eat everything in sight- including the students hiding out in the school gym!

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free
programme.desc: When the PALs find gold, things spiral out of control until Lucky and Spirit have to rescue their friends from the bottom of a mine!

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free
programme.desc: When a mountain lion is spotted in Miradero, no one is safe!

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business
programme.desc: Boss and family go on Spring Break to visit his grandparents in the big city of Chicago. Boss uses the trip to test his business mettle, by getting in a promotion war at a real big adult company. And when a department store refuses to let Gigi and Tim return an item, they wind up unionizing the entire sales force.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business
programme.desc: Mom and Dad are panicking after Gigi noticed Boss isn't growing, so Boss "puts himself under", taking a special formula that will turn him int a regular baby long enough to pass a Doctor's checkup. However, with Boss gone, all the villains from this season see it as the perfect time to strike Baby Corp, leaving Staci to hold the floodgates.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business
programme.desc: Looking to trim costs, Boss unknowingly fires Boom Baby, a super-undercover Baby Corp worker who displays to parents how unsafe things are by pratfalling on them and crying for attention. Convinced he's the victim of a conspiracy, Boom leaves a wake of parent worry in his path, forcing Boss to stop him.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: After injecting all the teachers with bee DNA, the Melvins run the new "hivemind" of the school. But Ms. Ribble is accidently injected with too much "Bee- NA" and becomes the queen bee, overpowering the Melvins' control. George, Harold and the recently re-hired Vice Principal Krupp must work with the Melvins and stop her from turning everyone into her Zombees.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree
programme.desc: After a crowverine gliding mishap, Dawn loses her confidence and tells Eep she's taking a break from adventures. Eep convinces Dawn to join her on one last adventure – climbing Grrr Mountain.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree
programme.desc: When Hope oversteps by trying to teach Sandy manners, Ugga gets her revenge by challenging Hope to do the impossible: civilize Thunk.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: After their intense battle against Mr. Lung, the Creature Brigade disbands, leaving Yi and Everest as the remaining creature helpers. But thanks to an inert – but magical – chunk of meat called Taisui that falls from the sky, Yi finds herself caught in a time loop, forcing her to return the meat to its rightful home before sundown. Meanwhile, Jin and Peng end up on their own creature mission of sorts. Eventually the crew reunites, and together they are able to return Taisui and end the loop.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: Our crew heads out of the city to reconnect with nature at a once-popular campsite, now deserted and in ruins owing to the urban legend of Yeren: a huge, hairy man who escaped from clown school as the tale goes. After some campfire spookiness, the crew comes face-to-face with the actual Yeren, who turns out to be a benevolent, camouflaging creature. The crew and Yeren team up to rejuvenate the campsite and keep it from being shut down.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: Yi and the crew are overrun with pings from humans who are frustrated by creatures they now live alongside. Just when they think they’ve solved one issue, another springs up – and then that original one pops up again too! Meanwhile, we see an ominous pedestal of light progressively become more cracked with each fraught human-creature relationship. At her wits’ end, Yi accidentally hurts Peng, Jin, and Everest with her magic. She then notices Everest fading into nothing…

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS
programme.desc: After a fight with her mom, Jun joins Tom on an adventure into the Fire Realm, where the knowledge of myths saves the day.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS

programme.desc: Guy is always surprising Eep with romantic gestures and Eep wants to return the favor. But when Guy proves impossible to surprise, Eep has to step up her game.

programme.desc: <Europe Outside Your Tent> returns with female cast members! Camping expert Ra Mi-ran will lead Han Ga-in, Jo Bo-ah and Ryu Hye-young to Southern France for a camping trip.

programme.title: Million Dollar American Princesses S2

programme.title: Air Warriors S7
programme.desc: They’re on the front lines of America’s toughest missions: state-of-the-art helicopters. Air Warriors: Top Choppers takes viewers behind the scenes and on-board aircraft that dominate today’s battlefields.

programme.title: Air Warriors S7
programme.desc: When ground troops are in trouble, they call for one thing: Close Air Support. Their guardian angels the A-10 THUNDERBOLT, the F-16 VIPER, the B-52 STRATOFORTRESS, the AC-130 and the HARRIER JUMP JET.

programme.title: A New Zealand Food Story S4
programme.desc: Ben’s travels to Hastings and discovers a holistic fully vertically integrated approach to creating grass fed Angus beef. He ventures to the local farmers market and meets amazing local food producers, reinforcing the abundance of produce grown in the region.

programme.title: A New Zealand Food Story S4
programme.desc: Ben’s meets an Orchardist and Food Innovation specialist. They have a shared vision to make all natural varietal – led apple juice, using the best technology in the world. He also checks out over 30 varieties of figs grown in the Mediterranean type climate of Hawkes Bay.

programme.title: A New Zealand Food Story S4
programme.desc: Ben takes a boat to visit a salmon farm in Akaroa and learns the difference between NZ King and Atlantic salmon. He catches salmon and cooks it on the shoreline overlooking the harbour. He checks out a high-quality homegrown culinary oil that’s both healthy and versatile, highlighting a commitment to local agriculture and sustainability.

programme.title: A New Zealand Food Story S4
programme.desc: It’s stone fruit season! Ben visits a family run orchard in Central Otago known for its long season of stone fruit and a strong connection to the land and community. He discovers an all-electric cherry farm where premium export cherries are sold direct to Kiwis.

programme.title: A New Zealand Food Story S4

programme.title: Fantastic Friends

programme.title: Fantastic Friends

programme.title: Fantastic Friends
programme.desc: In Dubai, Luke goes all out with adrenaline-packed dives, jetpacking thrills, golf swings, and speedboat races—then shares Potter memories over dinner…the loser picks up the tab!

programme.title: Fantastic Friends
programme.desc: In Saint Lucia, the twins crash Maisie’s getaway for a whirlwind of sailing adventures, jungle hikes, decadent chocolate massages, rum tastings, and endless tropical fun!

programme.title: Canada: A Year In The Wild
programme.desc: Summer is the season of plenty for most animals, but not polar bears; unable to hunt seals until the sea freezes over again, they grow hungrier by the day; for other animals summer is when youngsters must learn how to survive.

programme.title: Oceans Africa
programme.desc: This episode follows the journeys of these magnificent humpbacks, from their feeding grounds to their breeding grounds, the tender moments between mother and calf, and see the dangers their calves face in their first few months, including incredible interactions with predatory killer whales. The humpbacks also face a world full of human threats, from large container ships, to the impact of seismic testing in the search for oil and gas, now threatening their very survival once more.

programme.title: Oceans Africa
programme.desc: Often referred to as the dinosaur fish, the coelacanth occupies a unique place in the fossil record, and when it was rediscovered almost a century ago it shook the scientific community. We follow its journey to the present day, accompanying WildOceans' scientists on an expedition to uncover more of their secrets and behaviours.

programme.title: Destination Flavour: Japan
programme.desc: Adam meets a tea master, a Maiko, and a Michelin chef who turns risotto into sushi in the thriving traditional culture of Kyoto.

programme.title: Destination Flavour: Japan
programme.desc: Adam Liaw explores Japan's high-energy financial centre, Osaka, and finds the world's best fast food, a sumo wrestler turned chef, and soba noodles to die for.

programme.title: Destination Flavour: Japan
programme.desc: In Japan's southern islands of Kyushu and Shikoku, Adam Liaw finds a vibrant, warm culture where the cuisine is as fascinating as its people.

programme.title: Destination Flavour: Japan
programme.desc: Adam ends his taste tour through Japan with a trip to the island of Okinawa, where he discovers an eclectic cuisine and learns the secret to long life.

programme.title: Taste Of The Territory
programme.desc: Jimmy heads to the bustling Rapid Creek markets, mingling amongst the food stalls, produce growers, and locals out for their weekly shop.

programme.title: Taste Of The Territory
programme.desc: Jimmy meets some of the Greek community preparing food for the Greek cultural festival; he visits the colourful Malak Night Market.

programme.title: Space Disasters
programme.desc: It's one of the most challenging and dangerous phases of space exploration: bringing a spacecraft back to Earth. For decades, NASA and Soviet engineers and designers have struggled to build machines that can withstand the unforgivable heat and unthinkable speeds caused by re-entry into our atmosphere.

programme.title: Space Disasters
programme.desc: In space, there are few second chances. When something goes wrong, it's up to astronauts and Mission Control to come up with a solution together...and quickly.

programme.title: Space Disasters
programme.desc: NASA vigorously trains its astronauts to ensure they are physically fit, mentally strong, and as reliable as the strongest machines. But the fact is, even the brightest of people make mistakes...and in the unforgiving environment of space, any error, even a small one, can have life and death implications.

programme.title: Secrets Of The Museum S3

programme.title: Secrets Of The Museum S3
programme.desc: V&A curators uncover untold stories in objects, featuring African fashion, a kente cloth, a James Barnor photograph, and a puzzling 'Ancient Persian' dish.

programme.title: Secrets Of The Museum S3

programme.title: Secrets Of The Museum S3
programme.desc: This week, conservator Adriana cleans a Donatello sculpture, Simon receives Helen Mirren's costume from "The Audience," Christopher meets designer Sir Kenneth Grange, and V&A Dundee recruits artist Yinka Ilori for a colorful maze.

programme.title: Secrets Of The Museum S3

programme.title: Dinotrux

programme.title: Voltron: Legendary Defender
programme.desc: When a Galra Commander infiltrates the castle and destroys its power crystal, the team must protect Voltron from falling into the wrong hands.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T.
programme.desc: The snails are invited to perform on a cruise ship and while onboard Turbo encounters a group of rodent pirates who challenge him to a race—loser has to walk the plank/When Turbo is knocked out before a big charity race, Skidmark creates a shell that allows the crew to race the unconscious Turbo with a remote control.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T.
programme.desc: The snails accidentally wake a group of cicadas from their hibernation and after the bugs begin eating the town's food supply the snails go to extreme measures to rid the city of the /A celebrity chef steals Tito's taco recipe and challenges the FAST crew to a relay race against his own group of copycat racing snails.

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse
programme.desc: The dollhouse is immersed in imaginative Wild West play with Sheriff Gabby, Sheriff Pandy, and CatRat the Bandit. Sheriff Gabby and Sheriff Pandy must safely deliver gold to the bank, but it gets confiscated by Bandit CatRat! They go on an adventure to get the gold back and restore order in the dollhouse.

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse
programme.desc: Gabby brings DJ Catnip a microphone for him to use in the big music show, but he has some terrible news: he lost his groove! Determined to help him get his groove back, Gabby and Pandy take him on a musical search through the dollhouse. As they go, Gabby uses the microphone to record sounds from the Gabby Cats’ everyday activities that culminate into a new song that gets DJ his groove back just in time for the show! In our Gabby Cat of the Day Segment, Gabby sings a song!

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: As a prank, George and Harold use Melvin's new animal hybrid invention to create a creature that's a cross between a butt and a fly. But some of the monster butt-erflies want to eat everything in sight- including the students hiding out in the school gym!

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib
programme.desc: On the hottest week of the year and a miserable time for babies, Boss and Tim infiltrates a country club with a very cool splash pad in order to find some way around their strict “no-babies” policy. Meanwhile, Banker Baby Benny visits the startup company to check on his investment. Tina has to cover up how the heat has split her coworkers into lawless factions fighting over a fan and a mist cooler.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree
programme.desc: While the parents are away, the kids are in charge of the tree house, but when the punch monkeys invade the house, the kids find themselves out of their element.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: On the brink of his highly-anticipated White Coat Ceremony at school, Jin proudly dons his new white doctor’s coat around town, unwittingly drawing the attention of a creature named Morty. After a slobbery lick from Morty, Jin turns invisible! As Jin frantically tries to become re-visible, he discovers that Morty is very pregnant! Ultimately, Jin foregoes his ceremony and instead delivers Morty’s five babies.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS
programme.desc: During an attempt to get displaced Fire Gronckles back to their native Fire Realm, D’Angelo makes a mistake by accidentally feeding them Catastrophic Quaken eggs.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On!
programme.desc: Satin and Chenille put on a fashion show to impress the trendsetter of Troll VillagePoppy and Branch start a massive villagewide pillow battle to determine who gets the pillow of destiny.

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse
programme.desc: When Gabby unboxes a suitcase and a hotel brochure, it’s time to take a trip to The Dollhouse Hotel! Hotel guests Gabby and Pandy check in with the Hotel Manager DJ Catnip then go to Mercat’s Spa and even order room service from Pillow Cat! For our Gabby Cat of the Day Segment, Pillow Cat sings a song!

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse
programme.desc: Huzzah! Gabby the Bold and Pandy the Purr-owd are Knights in Training, and they head into the dollhouse for the Royal Knighting Ceremony. But it turns out that someone's locked King Catnip in the tower and without him they'll have to cancel the Royal Knighting Ceremony! It's up to the Knights in Training to solve the mystery and save King Catnip by performing acts of knighthood. For our Cat of the Day, Pandy makes a shield craft!

programme.title: Team Zenko Go
programme.desc: When Rodney accidentally catches Sam when she falls from a tree and starts to believe he’s a hero TZG secretly follow him around town to make sure his clumsy hero-ing doesn’t go wrong. / When Lula and Luis want a clubhouse for the Squasher Fan Club, TZG secretly help fix up the shed in Luis’ backyard.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go
programme.desc: When various townsfolk report having lost soft belongings, TZG secretly investigates to discover thieving pigeon Yolanda had been building a nest for baby gophers. / When Ian’s lucky badminton racket goes missing, TZG secretly finds and returns it in time for a rematch against his toughest opponent.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders
programme.desc: The Riders have to save Elbone when he's swallowed by a giant Sea Gronckle, and Dak's awful cooking might be just the thing to do it.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders
programme.desc: At a big town festival, Magnus challenges Duggard in a competition to be chief of Huttsgalor! Can the Riders help their friend keep his helmet?

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal
programme.desc: Kelps learns about memory spark in an attempt to relive a memory of his grandmother. / Kelp and the underwater gang put on a show to showcase their imaginary sparks. As she practices, however, Scallop becomes convinced her tusk has a real spark!

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal
programme.desc: Kelp is excited to celebrate his right of passage, breaking the ice with his horn. But when he struggles to break the ice like other narwhals, he is determined to do it “the Kelp way.”

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots
programme.desc: Puss is terrified by an invasion by a swarm of bees, which only the hippy-like “Piper” can control with her magic flute.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business

Boss uses the trip to test his business mettle, by getting in a promotion war at a real big adult company. And when a department store refuses to let Gigi and Tim return an item, they wind up unionizing the entire sales force.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business
programme.desc: Mom and Dad are panicking after Gigi noticed Boss isn't growing, so Boss "puts himself under", taking a special formula that will turn him int a regular baby long enough to pass a Doctor's checkup. However, with Boss gone, all the villains from this season see it as the perfect time to strike Baby Corp, leaving Staci to hold the floodgates.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business
programme.desc: Looking to trim costs, Boss unknowingly fires Boom Baby, a super-undercover Baby Corp worker who displays to parents how unsafe things are by pratfalling on them and crying for attention. Convinced he's the victim of a conspiracy, Boom leaves a wake of parent worry in his path, forcing Boss to stop him.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: After injecting all the teachers with bee DNA, the Melvins run the new "hivemind" of the school. But Ms. Ribble is accidently injected with too much "Bee- NA" and becomes the queen bee, overpowering the Melvins' control. George, Harold and the recently re-hired Vice Principal Krupp must work with the Melvins and stop her from turning everyone into her Zombees.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree
programme.desc: After a crowverine gliding mishap, Dawn loses her confidence and tells Eep she's taking a break from adventures. Eep convinces Dawn to join her on one last adventure – climbing Grrr Mountain.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree
programme.desc: When Hope oversteps by trying to teach Sandy manners, Ugga gets her revenge by challenging Hope to do the impossible: civilize Thunk.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: After their intense battle against Mr. Lung, the Creature Brigade disbands, leaving Yi and Everest as the remaining creature helpers. But thanks to an inert – but magical – chunk of meat called Taisui that falls from the sky, Yi finds herself caught in a time loop, forcing her to return the meat to its rightful home before sundown. Meanwhile, Jin and Peng end up on their own creature mission of sorts. Eventually the crew reunites, and together they are able to return Taisui and end the loop.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: Our crew heads out of the city to reconnect with nature at a once-popular campsite, now deserted and in ruins owing to the urban legend of Yeren: a huge, hairy man who escaped from clown school as the tale goes. After some campfire spookiness, the crew comes face-to-face with the actual Yeren, who turns out to be a benevolent, camouflaging creature. The crew and Yeren team up to rejuvenate the campsite and keep it from being shut down.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: Yi and the crew are overrun with pings from humans who are frustrated by creatures they now live alongside. Just when they think they’ve solved one issue, another springs up – and then that original one pops up again too! Meanwhile, we see an ominous pedestal of light progressively become more cracked with each fraught human-creature relationship. At her wits’ end, Yi accidentally hurts Peng, Jin, and Everest with her magic. She then notices Everest fading into nothing…

programme.title: 10 Fight 10 Season 3
programme.desc: The show brings Thai superstars, singers, boxers, models and rappers into the celebrity boxing ring. Season 2 features a first ever Thai female match and Season 3 has two Olympics gold medalists competing for the championship. This unique boxing show offers all-round entertainment, with live performances, lavish costumes and real fights with blood!

programme.title: The Gangster, the Cop, the Devil
programme.desc: The movie is adapted from real events. Detective Lin sets up a special unit to arrest the motorbike robber and the crime syndicate behind the thefts in Foshan. In the process, his pregnant wife is hit by a motorbike robber, leading him to uncover their revenge plan...

programme.title: Fierce Cop
programme.desc: To save his son who has been kidnapped by human traffickers, police officer Zhang relentlessly hunts them down and accidentally finds himself implicated in a major child abduction case. In the process, he teams up with a mysterious lady to crack the international crime syndicate and rescue his son.

programme.title: The Ultimate BROcation
programme.desc: A hilarious reality show about four famous male celebrities from different countries on an all-expenses-paid fantasy vacation in Hong Kong, tailor-made for the “bros”!

programme.title: Operation Bangkok
programme.desc: Military veteran Wu and undercover cop Ming rescue hostages on an island near Bangkok. When Wu discovers his daughter has also been captured, he stays with Ming to fight the thugs and save her.

programme.title: Iron Ball
programme.desc: This sports entertainment show brings the best special forces from Iron Squad to take on a new challenge – dodgeball. The 26 players will enter a fierce competition, until a strongest team armed with powerful athletic endurance and mental strength is formed. Witness how they compete in front of the star athletes and legendary dodgeball coaches!

programme.title: Oceanfront Property Hunt
programme.desc: Sara and Russell are ready to escape the sweltering southern heat and start afresh in a charming fishing village along the East Coast. They're searching for the perfect home to embrace a coastal lifestyle.

programme.title: MasterChef USA (S13)
programme.desc: The auditions continue as chefs from the Midwest battle it out for a coveted spot in the top 20. Each contestant has 45 minutes to prepare a signature dish that will impress the judges.

programme.title: Kings Of BBQ
programme.desc: Anthony and Cedric dive head-first into the tedious (yet delicious) task of menu planning - calling on friends, mentors, and award winning pitmasters Rasheed Phillips and Kevin Bludso to guide the way.

programme.title: Her Affair To Die For
programme.desc: A young woman's father becomes the obsession of her seductive roommate, who will stop at nothing to possess him.

programme.title: Giving Hope: The Ni'Cola Mitchell Story
programme.desc: Ni'Cola Mitchell, successful author, realises at a book signing that her calling is to help disadvantaged girls. She launches Girls Who Brunch, to make young women feel seen and empowered.

programme.title: Oceanfront Property Hunt
programme.desc: Dalene and Pete have lived a nomadic life for many years and want to find an oceanfront home to put down roots while still sparking their creativity. Will they be able finally to settle down?

programme.title: Oceanfront Property Hunt
programme.desc: Sara and Russell are ready to escape the sweltering southern heat and start afresh in a charming fishing village along the East Coast. They're searching for the perfect home to embrace a coastal lifestyle.

programme.title: Hit-and-Miss Tour (S1)
programme.desc: Five celebrity friends go on a trip together but at each stop where it costs money, they will have to play games against each other to be exempt from paying. One final loser will cover the costs for all.

programme.title: Deliciously Twisted Classics
programme.desc: Sound the fire alarm! These chefs have a penchant for peppers so they're twisting classic foods and cranking the heat up. Grab a glass of milk because these twisted dishes will set your taste buds on fire.

programme.title: Zombie House Flipping (S5)
programme.desc: Chauncey turns the tables on Derek by buying a tiny house without consulting him. But when a garage conversion turns into a permitting mess, will this Chauncey Special turn into a Chauncey Nightmare?

programme.title: Giving Hope: The Ni'Cola Mitchell Story
programme.desc: Ni'Cola Mitchell, successful author, realises at a book signing that her calling is to help disadvantaged girls. She launches Girls Who Brunch, to make young women feel seen and empowered.

programme.title: The Paramedic Who Stalked Me
programme.desc: After an accident, a young woman finds herself the target of the EMT who saved her life. She reminds him of his high school love who died - and he will do anything to have her back in his life.

programme.title: MasterChef USA (S13)
programme.desc: The auditions conclude with chefs from the South. Each contestant has 45 minutes to prepare a signature dish that will impress the judges and secure the five remaining spots in the top 20.

programme.title: Legends Of The Fork
programme.desc: Buddy heads to two restaurants with huge reputations. First up is DiFara Pizza in Brooklyn, New York to learn the secrets to their famous slice. Then it's off to visit Mini Kabob in Glendale, California.

programme.title: Zombie House Flipping (S5)
programme.desc: Alynne ropes the team into a triplex renovation with her friend Octavian, who is in way over his head. A good deal with huge profit potential quickly turns into a costly venture due to Octavian's ways.

programme.title: Yuri's Winning Recipe (S2)
programme.desc: Yuri has been passionately posting home-cooked food on her Instagram account. Is there any better way to fall in love with cooking than experimenting with new recipes and sharing them with viewers?

programme.title: Rachael Ray In Tuscany
programme.desc: Rachael prepares her favourite Sicilian dish, pasta con le sarde, or sardine pasta, using both canned fish and fresh sardines atop long-cut pasta.

programme.title: Rachael Ray In Tuscany
programme.desc: Author and chef Sara Moulton joins Rachael in her Tuscan kitchen for a cooking challenge. Both Rachael and Sara create mystery meals using ingredients from Rachael's Tuscan pantry.

programme.title: Got To Leave Something
programme.desc: Nam-gil and Sang-yoon arrive at the end of Korea, at the beautiful Mihwangsa Temple in Haenam, with a stunning view of the South Sea. They spend a day at the temple, with the head monk.

programme.title: Earth Sweepers
programme.desc: Five men set out on an eco-journey to Mongolia: leader Kim Seok-hoon, Kwon Yul, Lim Woo-il, Shin Jae-ha and nomad Shaun. With only backpacks, they have a shared mission to 'clean the Earth'.

programme.title: Rachael Ray's Meals In Minutes (S1)
programme.desc: Rachael shows us how to make an impossibly delicious brunch menu of parm frittata with tomato sauce, served with a side of sausage and a simple salad that you can eat all day.

programme.title: The Pregnancy Scheme
programme.desc: Pregnant and newly single, Julia faces a catastrophe when she loses her job. A lifeline arrives in the form of her new friend Alana, who says she knows people who would pay for positive pregnancy tests.

programme.title: Never Not Love You
programme.desc: It tells the story of young lovers who tries to build a life together until career opportunities sends them to a different country where their relationship will be tested.

programme.title: Boso
programme.desc: Jake (Epy Quizon) is a caretaker at a boarding residence that houses a whole array of characters. Through the holes he has carved on the ceiling, he has become privy to their most intimate and darkest secrets.

programme.title: Tililing
programme.desc: Three interns are assigned in an asylum where they meet three mental patients. Through their stories, the interns get to enter their world and learn their painful experiences.

programme.title: Linlang
programme.desc: Rich, beautiful and in love, Lance and Lyra are an ideal couple. But the end of their blissful marriage begins when Lance meets Jill. The love triangle distorts their perspectives, and ultimately, it leads to a tragic death.

programme.title: Hustler
programme.desc: George is an excellent pool player and has in fact, established a reputation in the field of billiards. Later, he decided to take advantage of his talent and used the sport as a source of living.

programme.title: Sons of Nanay Sabel
programme.desc: After she was accused of being a negligent mother, Sabel's (Ai-ai delas Alas) wedding to Prince Harry was cancelled. To make things right, she embarks on a journey to find her estranged sons and reunite her family.

programme.title: Magbuwag Ta Kay
programme.desc: "Magbuwag Ta Kay" (Let's Break Up, Kay) revolves around college sweethearts Roy (Rowell Ucat) and Kay (Akiko Solon), who have to come to terms of their looming breakup.

programme.title: On Vodka, Beers and Regrets
programme.desc: A washed up actress and former child star Jane Pineda (Bela Padilla), battles with love, chances and alcoholism as her career plummets to rock bottom.

programme.title: Matalino Man Ang Matsing, Naiisahan Din!
programme.desc: Their personalities are as opposite as the two poles, and the worlds they respectively belong to be perpetually at odds. Gener (Eddie Garcia) is an accomplished policeman whose track record in solving crimes is exceptional, while Mando (Willie Revillame ) is a slick con man who has a knack at wearing disguises.

programme.title: Won't Last A Day Without You
programme.desc: DJ Heidee (Sarah Geronimo) provides love advice to people who are having problems in their relationships. In the process of getting Melissa and Andrew together, Heidee begin to feel an attraction toward Andrew.

programme.title: The Fighting Chefs
programme.desc: Two warring chefs and their restaurants are threatened by the 3-month deadline imposed to them by Don Manolo to vacate their place for it will be sold to a condominium developer.

programme.title: Ika-13 Kapitulo
programme.desc: The birth of Angela (Anne Curtis) brings tremendous joy to the couple David (Christopher de Leon) and Sara (ZsaZsa Padilla). Angela would complete their union and makes them a complete family.

programme.title: Ate
programme.desc: Helen (Ara Mina) and Dave (Paolo Paraiso) are a happy couple, but their relationship is tested when Helen's younger sister Cleo (Cristine Reyes) comes into the picture.

programme.title: Ulo Ng Gang-Ho
programme.desc: The life story of Viyong, a notorious police from Balic-Balic, Samaloc.

programme.title: Laruan
programme.desc: Joy (Carmi Martin) has only one ambition in life--to get rich and give her family a more comfortable life. She enslaves herself to William (Mark Gil) in her hope that he will help her achieve her goal.

programme.title: Reputasyon
programme.desc: What a nice schoolgirl like Miya Brown (Mia Nolasco) doing in a club as G.R.O.? She has learned that there is life beyond her mother's world and that of her father's.

programme.title: Anino Ni Asedillo
programme.desc: The legacy of the legendary hero Asedillo (Fernando Poe, Jr.) lives on. A simple school teacher who fought for the rights of others at the cost of his life. Asedillo is the role model of Simon (Conrad Poe). He becomes an active union official in the factory he is working for to lobby for workers' rights.

programme.title: Sa Diyos Lang Ako Susuko
programme.desc: Romano disobeyed his father when he became a soldier. The old man believed that peace could only be attained if people were to avoid all forms of violence. How ironic for him then to come home and find his father murdered and the criminals unknown and unpunished?

programme.title: Blue Jeans Gang
programme.desc: Brian (Keempee de Leon), Alan (Gary Estrada), Jerry (Kier Legaspi), Tom (Joko Diaz), Jojo(Michael Rivero), and Pat (Dennis Padilla) call themselves the BLUE JEANS GANG. They consider themselves to be more like brothers than friends.

programme.title: Judge Max Asuncion, Hukom Bitay
programme.desc: Based on the real-life adventures of Judge Max Asuncion who was known as a stickler for the law and as a man who got death threats for breakfast.

programme.title: Pretty Boy
programme.desc: Andrew E times two doubles the fun in this comedy about mistaken identities and the hilarious results. Andrew played Pretty Boy, a well-known gangster who was dressed in designer suits.

programme.title: Buy One, Take One
programme.desc: Salve (Sharon) and Sion (Susan) are sisters living with their grandparents. One day, Salve's friend invites her to apply for abroad only to be tricked because it was an illegal recruitment agency selling women for foreigners.

programme.title: The Untouchable Family
programme.desc: Ma Barker and sons Mad Max, Machinegun Nonong and Pretty Boy Fredo want to be the number one criminal family in the land.

programme.title: Trabaho Lang Dear, Walang Personalan
programme.desc: Former carnival workers Leo and Amanda were trying to make a living by doing all sorts of jobs. From Dyesebel and Babaing Gagamba, Amanda was now a security guard by day and a nightclub bunny by night.

programme.title: Gaano Kadalas Ang Minsan (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: Vilma was a single mother. Her only son was dying of leukemia. His only desire was to meet his father. To grant his wish, Vilma entered into an arrangement with her best friend, Hilda.

programme.title: Anino Sa Dilim
programme.desc: Randy (Erwin Montes) and Mitch (Sara Gomez) invites two other couples to spend a relaxing vacation in Randy's rest house. But soon, the vacation turns into a nightmare as the guests turn up dead one after the other.

programme.title: The Mentalist S5 6
programme.desc: The CBI team investigates the kidnapping of a couple that may be the victim of mistaken identity, while Jane continues his investigation into Lorelei's whereabouts.

programme.title: Full House S1 19
programme.desc: Unbeknownst to the family, Jesse leaves the house after becoming frustrated because of his lack of privacy.Part one of a two-part episode.

programme.title: Container Wars S3 10
programme.desc: Four unique containers go up for auction after missing their holiday deadlines. A can of vintage nostalgia has Matt salivating, "Team Muscle turns into "Team Softy," and Uzi gets the scare of a lifetime. Plus, a mysterious logo could be the key tobig bucks

programme.title: Container Wars S3 11
programme.desc: When jumbo-sized containers make their way to the yard, buyers use every trick in the book to win, big time. A bin full of outdoor BBQs could send two bidders up in flames, while a 'ready-to-go' rave unit sounds like music to the Israeli's ears. Plus, Mo and Ty feel the need for speed, but will their huge bet pay off?

programme.title: Storage Hunters S4 11
programme.desc: Brandon goes out on a limb, and finds himself sinking in quicksand with no help from Lori - will Desert Dan lend him a hand? Dan's car smarts come in handy, while T Money rocks out with his win. Will Scott and Chrissy climb to the top, or fall hard in today's auction?

programme.title: Storage Hunters S4 12
programme.desc: Scott blows his wad on an Oktoberfest bin, and will have to drown his sorrows. The Alvarado Brothers bid big on collectibles -- will they draw a wild card? T Money rides away with a big win, while Brandon and Lori investigate a crime scene bin. Willeveryone make it out of the auction alive?

programme.title: Dodgeball Thunderdome S1 3
programme.desc: With $25,000 on the line, only the strong survive The Thunderdome.

programme.title: Arrow S2 24
programme.desc: In the Season Two Finale, Oliver must decide once and for all whether he's a killer or a hero when Slade moves forward with his plan to kill one more person in Oliver's life.

programme.title: Dirty Money S1 1
programme.desc: The Direstas find a curbside treasure which inspires Jimmy to dismantle John's sentimental typewriter and transform it into a steampunk masterpiece.

programme.title: Dirty Money S1 2
programme.desc: An old bike, a rusty chainsaw, and some childhood memories inspire the boys to invent a one of a kind motorized flea market masterpiece.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S4 11
programme.desc: Brandon goes out on a limb, and finds himself sinking in quicksand with no help from Lori - will Desert Dan lend him a hand? Dan's car smarts come in handy, while T Money rocks out with his win. Will Scott and Chrissy climb to the top, or fall hard in today's auction?

programme.title: Storage Hunters S4 12
programme.desc: Scott blows his wad on an Oktoberfest bin, and will have to drown his sorrows. The Alvarado Brothers bid big on collectibles -- will they draw a wild card? T Money rides away with a big win, while Brandon and Lori investigate a crime scene bin. Willeveryone make it out of the auction alive?

programme.title: Container Wars S3 12
programme.desc: Buyers battle to prove who's king of the playground and a can full of bicycle gear gets everyone's wheels turning. Plus, a mystery container includes one item that requires a special operating license. Who'll be able to haul it off the lot?

programme.title: Container Wars S3 13
programme.desc: A container riddled with bullets, a burned-out box, and a freak accident on the lot put everyone on edge, until an out-of-this-world discovery leads to the biggest win yet.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S4 13
programme.desc: Sean holds a one of a kind auction in Malibu, at the Rolls Royce of storage facilities. T Money needs a robot -- but does that mean he'll get it? Jesse draws on his pinball skills to outwit his competitors, while Brandon and Lori take one of the biggest gambles of their career. Will it pay off with an unbelievable score, or will they be crying all the way to the bank?

programme.title: Storage Hunters S5 1
programme.desc: Lori knows from her research that two of these bins previously belonged to the same owner. She and Brandon win one of them, an aviation bin; now they have to find the other one. But things don't go the way they want when Dan, the Biker Dude, ends upwith the matching bin; now they either have to make a deal, or get stuck with half a plane.

programme.title: Giant
programme.desc: Wealthy rancher Bick Benedict (Hudson) and dirt-poor cowboy Jett Rink (Dean) both woo Leslie Lynnton (Taylor) a beautiful young woman from Maryland who is new to Texas. She marries Benedict, but she is shocked by the racial bigotry of the White Texans against the local people of Mexican descent. Rink discovers oil on a small plot of land, and while he uses his vast, new wealth to buy all the land surrounding the Benedict ranch, the Benedict's disagreement over prejudice fuels conflict the runs across generations.

programme.title: Party Time Pogo
programme.desc: It's party time with Pogo! He's excited for Jeff's party, but they have very different ideas of what makes a party fun.

programme.title: Fun and Play At the Garage
programme.desc: It's fun & playtime at the garage! The team rescues Weasel from a blimp, takes an imaginary trip to outer space & has a wacky waterslide party.

programme.title: Thankful Pie
programme.desc: The team bakes a thankful pie for Grandma! They also have to catch a runaway tire, rescue a boat with a tow rope & play a game of football.

programme.title: Learning City Farm
programme.desc: It's a learning city farm! Count the buses, make a salad & learn how to recycle with all your friends.

programme.title: Singing Fun!
programme.desc: It's time for singing fun! Learn your ABCs, wash your hands before you eat & get ready for a sleepover at Grandma Mei's house.

programme.title: Mid Autumn fun with JJ
programme.desc: Have some Mid-Autumn fun with JJ! The family has a pretend play day, makes pasta with Grandma & enjoys some delicious rainbow popsicles.

programme.title: Mid-Autumn Food Party
programme.desc: It's a Mid-Autumn food party! The family gets some exercise, Dad pretends to be an ice cream man & the friends make rainbow popsicles.

programme.title: Mid-Autumn Festival Thanks
programme.desc: It's a Mid-Autumn Festival of thanks! The family sings about gratitude, makes rainbow popsicles & learns that it's good to be thankful.

programme.title: Your Favourite Songs
programme.desc: It’s a musical day with Baby John! Join him as he sings about his family, animal friends, & all the fun things he discovers in his wonderful world.

programme.title: Your Favourite Songs
programme.desc: It’s a musical day with Baby John! Join him as he sings about his family, animal friends, & all the fun things he discovers in his wonderful world.

programme.title: It's a Wonderful World
programme.desc: From the secrets of the Ancient Pyramids to the way our brains work, Blippi Wonders explores what makes our world so wonderful.

programme.title: Love Our Planet
programme.desc: Love our planet with Blippi! He learns about recycling in the Earth Day song, builds a playground & discovers how a boulder becomes a grain of sand.

programme.title: Tick Tock Bot
programme.desc: Arpo's day is full of wild inventions & crazy gadgets, from a multiplying ray to a runaway drone, leading to hilarious, unintended consequences.

programme.title: Baby Chaos
programme.desc: Arpo is on baby duty, but this is no ordinary baby! From super-strength to unexpected transformations, Arpo has his hands full keeping the baby safe.

programme.title: JJ's Animal Friends!
programme.desc: Join JJ on a musical field trip! He's visiting the farm to sing with the cows & sheep, & meeting all sorts of amazing animal friends.

programme.title: Sing Along Fun With JJ!
programme.desc: The musical adventures never end! Join JJ & his friends as they find a song for every moment, from playing with animals to learning.

programme.title: Sport's Day!
programme.desc: Ready, set, play! It’s sports day, & JJ is learning how to swim, play soccer, & have fun being active with his friends.

programme.title: Moon Festival Mayhem
programme.desc: It's Moon Festival mayhem! Baby John has a bubbly tummy, tries ketchup on everything & becomes a detective to find a missing cookie.

programme.title: Cody's Moon Festival Family Fun
programme.desc: It's Cody's Moon Festival family fun! The family sings the ABCs with soup, plays in the autumn leaves & celebrates Cody's dino-themed birthday.

programme.title: Squeaker Size
programme.desc: The friends are squeaker size! They head to the Exercise Planet to stop their squeaking, then visit the Tree House Planet to find a clubhouse.

programme.title: Orbits' Small Problem
programme.desc: Orbit has a small problem! He can't see the tiny objects at the Miniature Museum, then his puzzle skills are tested on the Puzzle Planet.

programme.title: Numbers, Sounds and Colours
programme.desc: Let's learn about numbers, sounds & colors! The friends catch colorful kites, bake cookies & learn about the sounds that vehicles make.

programme.title: Sing Along To Your Favourites
programme.desc: Let's sing along to your favorites! Max gets his first bath, Mia & Max play peek-a-boo & the friends learn all about shapes on a train ride.

programme.title: The Backwards Bus!
programme.desc: Buster becomes the backwards bus! He takes on a challenge from Bandit & learns to drive backwards all the way up a mountain.

programme.title: In the Life of Buster
programme.desc: See what it's like in the life of Buster! He plays a prank at the carwash, becomes a doctor for a day & enjoys a game of pirate soft play.

programme.title: Magical Morphle
programme.desc: When trouble is near, magical Morphle is here! Watch as he transforms into amazing machines & mighty dinosaurs to save the day.

programme.title: A Day With Mila!
programme.desc: Join Mila for a day of amazing adventures where her magic pet, Morphle, transforms into anything she needs to help friends & solve problems.

programme.title: Earth and Nature
programme.desc: Explore Earth & nature! Learn why rain is important, help out on Earth Day & watch a caterpillar turn into a beautiful butterfly.

programme.title: Farming Sing Along
programme.desc: It's a farming sing-along! Learn your ABCs, do the five senses shakedown & go stargazing with Grandma Mei.

programme.title: Mid-Autumn Family Fun
programme.desc: Have some Mid-Autumn family fun! The family goes through their bedtime routine, gets outside for a park day & welcomes a new baby sister.

programme.title: Moon Festival Food Fun With JJ
programme.desc: It's Moon Festival food fun with JJ! The family learns about yummy vegetables, makes mashed potatoes & has a Thanksgiving-style feast.

programme.title: Singing Is Always Fun
programme.desc: Singing is always fun with Cody! He learns to handle his emotions, discovers his baby sister can crawl & has a playdate where he learns to share.

programme.title: Sing Along With JJ and Friends!
programme.desc: Sing along with JJ & friends! Build a giant pillow fort, go on a camper van vacation & learn how to make the perfect PB&J sandwich.

programme.title: ABC's and Counting With JJ
programme.desc: Learning is an adventure! Sing your way through the alphabet with JJ, & then count to ten with some very friendly dinosaurs.

programme.title: Storytime
programme.desc: It's storytime! Jeff is excited to read his new book, but he doesn't want to share it with his friends.

programme.title: Cupcake Chaos
programme.desc: It's cupcake chaos! Lulu tries to bake a cupcake all by herself, but it turns into a giant blob that takes over the Playpod.

programme.title: Learning and Fun!
programme.desc: It's a day of learning & fun! The team rescues Scout from a hole, learns about mixing colors & saves a baby lion from the Bandit Bus.

programme.title: Construction Trouble!
programme.desc: There's construction trouble! The team builds a house upside down, uncovers dinosaur bones & has to clear a blocked water trench.

programme.title: Time For Fun!
programme.desc: It's time for fun! The animals have escaped from Old MacDonald's farm, the London Bridge has fallen down & a roller coaster train goes on a wild ride.

programme.title: Be Kind To Each Other!
programme.desc: Let's be kind to each other! The friends rescue a kitty from a well, help a friend who is being bullied & learn to play fair in a soccer game.

programme.title: Important Jobs
programme.desc: Learn about important jobs! The twins become doctors, police officers & firefighters & they even get to be construction workers for a day.

programme.title: Singing Fun Time!
programme.desc: It's singing fun time! The family sings about the black sheep at the farm, does the baby shark dance & gets ready for bed with a lullaby.

programme.desc: Live debate show on the key topic of the day with four guests from different spots of the globe, from Monday to Thursday. Get the latest facts and expert opinions about the most essential stories happening around us and draw your own conclusions. The show is well known for its dynamics due to live debates with its various guests.

programme.title: Irma La Douce

programme.title: WIFI
programme.desc: Li Hong Shan’s wife died in a car accident. One year later, he suddenly receives a message from his dead wife. Li vows to save his wife's life through this time transcending WIFI signal, but ends up uncovering a bigger conspiracy behind…

programme.title: The Ghost Writer
programme.desc: A struggling writer must write a hit novel to save his career. He retreats to his childhood home where his father, also a successful writer, died mysteriously. Upon discovering his father's final manuscript, he realizes it's far superior to anything he could create. He decides to plagiarize the work, setting off a series of horrifying events.

programme.title: Fate Jealous Greed
programme.desc: The film consists of three short horror stories: a man tries to survive after he received a haunted mail predicting his death; while a man mourns the death of his beloved wife, she becomes a ghost and tries to communicate with him; three brothers clash over the care options of their elderly mother during dinner, leading to a terrifying murder.

programme.title: Death of a Girlfriend
programme.desc: When Christine was found brutally murdered in the woods, her boyfriend, a forest ranger and a farmer are summoned to an inquest. Each suspect has his version to tell, but as the investigation progresses, a dark secret is uncovered, which would reveal the real murderer.

programme.title: Dorome Boys version
programme.desc: Drama clubs from an all-boys and all-girls high school hold a joint training camp. A series of horrific and ususual events soon take place at the camp and the students learn that an old mountain legend creature, Dorome, is responsible.

programme.title: Midnight Ruins
programme.desc: Fallen painter Cheng Zihao is asked to investigate the strange events that occurred during the rehearsal of a play "Song of the Night" by an old friend. This play was rehearsed by them in the past, and has brought him many pains and nightmares. As Cheng Zihao uncovers the truth, he is shocked by the same story of love and hate after so many years…

programme.title: An Unquiet Grave
programme.desc: A year after Jamie's wife tragically died in a car accident, he persuades her sister, Ava, to accompany him to the accident site to perform a peculiar ritual. As the night progresses, it becomes evident that Jamie harbours sinister motives.

programme.title: Open the Coffin
programme.desc: Ghost Hand and his tomb raiders resurface in Jiang City to seek gold in ancient tombs after a 3-year absence. They released an evil spirit from a coffin and all four died at home eventually. Poison and pinholes in the corpses become the sole clue for police investigation. A tomb raid now unfolds as a perplexing and mysterious case.

programme.title: American Justice
programme.desc: When an Army Sergeant is gunned down on New Year's Eve, investigators are at a loss on who would harm the beloved family man, until fellow soldiers in his unit confess shocking secrets to solve his murder.

programme.title: Accused: Did I Do It?
programme.desc: A man is killed instantly after a head-on collision with a young mother driving home from a late-night shift at a Florida hotel. The Prosecution allege she was under the influence and caused the crash.

programme.title: Accused: Did I Do It?
programme.desc: A 21-year-old man is charged with domestic terrorism after a spree of shootings on the freeway sends the public into panic. Facing over 100 years in prison, the young father claims he has an alibi.

programme.title: I Survived A Crime (S2)
programme.desc: A simple snack at a local restaurant turns violent when a grandmother is ripped off, but does not give up. A woman takes on the man who slammed into her van and then tries to run.

programme.title: I Survived A Crime (S2)
programme.desc: A brave grandma fights off two carjackers intent on stealing her truck; a woman stands up against heinous domestic violence; two assailants pull a gun on a store manager who escapes.

programme.title: The Jars Murderer
programme.desc: After murdering and dismembering his victims, a Hong Kong taxi driver often kept their organs and indulged in necrophilia.

programme.title: Hoarders (S14)
programme.desc: Reselling scrap junk became very hard as the market for scrap metal pays much less and so Andy had talked his mother into getting a reverse mortgage on the property.

programme.title: Beyond The Headlines: The Series
programme.desc: Heartbreaking accounts of families torn apart by crime. Ashley Wallace, who was almost killed by her own mother, Jenny Carrieri, whose search for her sister's murderer consumed her life.

programme.title: Cold Case Files (S3)
programme.desc: When a beloved schoolteacher is found murdered in her Neptune, New Jersey apartment in the fall of 2009, suspicion is cast on her soon to be ex-husband.

programme.desc: One wrong move could get anyone booked in; like a son who landed himself in jail after his dad rear-ended a car, or a gearhead who gets spotted by a helicopter after allegedly doing a burnout.

programme.title: The Pickup Truck Killer
programme.desc: Chamlong 'Nirut' Sornkamharn worked the highways of Thailand, hiring men as truck drivers, poisoning them to death and stealing their cars. Was he working for car traffickers or a serial killer?

programme.title: #TextMeWhenYouGetHome (S2)
programme.desc: Those closest to Madison Nygard share the agonising details around the beautiful 16-year-old's terrifying abduction as she walked home from a party.

programme.title: Booked: First Day In (S2)
programme.desc: A fight at a marijuana dispensary ends with a stabbing, and a couple faces life-changing charges. A 22-year-old rapper is delighted by his mugshot but not by spending his birthday in jail.

programme.title: Undercover: Caught On Tape
programme.desc: Undercover ATF and DEA agents are reminded to never judge a book by its cover and to always be on their toes. Even small-time suspects have the potential to unleash terror.

programme.title: City Confidential
programme.desc: A historic Texan town is stunned when a popular caretaker is found dead and a beloved resident goes missing. But with support from a concerned community, detectives uncover the secrets that led to murder.

programme.title: Cold Case Files: DNA Speaks
programme.desc: When Susan Woods, 30, is found beaten and drowned in her tub in America's Cowboy Capitol, suspicion falls on her estranged husband.

programme.title: Murdered At First Sight (S1)

programme.title: Cold Case Files: Dead West
programme.desc: When a Christian ranch hand, Dan Lavigne, 52, is shot dead on his porch in Montana, 2002, deputies find no shortage of suspects.

programme.title: Witness To Murder: Digital Evidence
programme.desc: Police quickly identify a suspect in the murder of a local college professor, but a bombshell piece of technology stolen from the crime scene then points them in a completely different direction.

programme.title: Danger Force
programme.desc: Bose's Mom, Celia, picks up Schwoz's lost radioactive cat from outside SW.A.G. and takes it home, so Danger Force and Captain Man have to try and get it back before she goes nuclear.

programme.title: The Casagrandes
programme.desc: Ronnie Anne and her pals enlist Carlos X as their coach in a skate-off against Tony Hawk! // Tired of the bullies at school, Alexis learns the tough guy ropes from Carl.

programme.title: The Casagrandes
programme.desc: Bobby's dream of playing in a band might finally come true, but can he hang with Par's punk pals? // Worried he's not keeping up with his cool friends, Sameer tries to break a record for some street cred.

programme.title: Wylde Pak
programme.desc: The family prepares for war, AKA a trip to the local Asian market. After their battle to procure a rare cookie, Jack feels more part of the family. // The Groom & Board gets a bad review. Lily tries to find the culprit and "correct the record.

programme.title: Tales of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
programme.desc: The Turtles take the fight to Bishop but she's ready for them... get ready for MECHA-BIHSOP! But when the Mechazoids go out of control, can the Turtles save humanity?

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: SpongeBob cleans out the boating school lighthouse, where he finds a cute but inconvenient companion. // No one in Bikini Bottom is safe from a case of contagious hiccups.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: The Gal Pals take Pearl to a cabin in the woods for a weekend of silly pranks. // Mr. Krabs has a secret taste for something surprising.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: SpongeBob and Patrick create their own zoo made entirely of bubbles! // The Krusty Krab goes under emergency quarantine, but no one knows who carries the mysterious illness.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: SpongeBob watches Mr. Krabs's house while he's away, so he takes extreme measures to make sure no one breaks in.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show
programme.desc: Patrick ventures inside Cecil to learn how the body works. // Cecil takes his kids camping, but Squidina wants the drama of reality TV.

programme.title: Tales of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
programme.desc: Donnie and Wingnut go to restore power to the Lair but get trapped by the East River 3! The water is rising and they're not alone... there's a monster down there with them!

programme.title: Tales of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
programme.desc: The mutant seahorse called MUSTANG SALLY is going to flood the city... and the only thing standing in his way are LEO and Pigeon Pete. Being the leader isn't all it's cracked up to be.

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: Hazel, Cosmo, and Wanda must pass Wish Trials or Jorgen will assign Hazel to a new fairy who's more efficient, but less fun. // Nervous about not fitting in with the other kids at school, Hazel wishes to be friends with the teachers instead.

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: Dev teams up with an infamous anti-fairy to give Hazel an epic run of bad luck.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: Papa Smurf holds a special vote to decide who will act as Rescue Smurfs if Gargamel attacks the village. // After Clumsy saves Chef's life, Chef takes Clumsy on as his assistant in the kitchen. It's a catastrophe.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: When Brainy criticizes Chef's cooking, Chef walks out in a huff and ends up cooking for the Ogres. // When Clumsy and Dimwitty take care of Baby, they try to show all of Smurf Village how smurfsome they really are.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: Jokey gives Farmer's racing snails an extra kick from a magic potion that makes them super fast. // Chef gets jealous when Lily starts to make waffles that are more delicious than his.

programme.title: The Casagrandes
programme.desc: Sid faces off against Lisa Loud in the Great Lakes City robotics competition! // When faced with a deadline and no inspiration, Frida tries to use Lalo's paintings as her own!

programme.title: Orange Carpet All Access
programme.desc: Orange Carpet All Access is going out of this world! We meet the creators of a brand new Nickelodeon galactic adventure: Tim Rex in Space!

programme.title: The Casagrandes
programme.desc: Ronnie Anne lands the internship of a lifetime with Bruno, but will she be able to hang? // Dreaming of DJ-ing at the Gatos halftime show, Carl goes undercover with Alexis and the school band!

programme.title: The Casagrandes
programme.desc: Ronnie Anne and Bobby have to deal with an old friend of Arturo's-Al the Alpaca, but Al has it out for the kids. // Abuelo helps CJ build a rocket, but when things aren't going well, Abuelo tells a little fib to preserve CJ's feelings.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show
programme.desc: After Patrick eats life-threatening chum, SpongeBob helps him check off his bucket list. // Patrick devolves back into a baby so he can keep his childhood toys.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: Plankton tells Patrick he's his conscience so he can convince the wooden-headed star to steal him a Krabby Patty. // When Mr. Krabs puts in an open kitchen, SpongeBob gets stage fright and has to invent a new persona.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: Plankton hasn't tried to steal the secret formula in a while...and that's making Mr. Krabs nervous! // When Patrick discovers the pineapple's library, SpongeBob introduces him to the wonderful world of book learning!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: Plankton goes to jail, but the secret formula is taken as evidence! SpongeBob and Mr. Krabs plot to get it back. // Sandy struggles to build a ship-in-a-bottle before a big contest, so SpongeBob calls in a little extra help.

programme.title: The Thundermans: Undercover
programme.desc: After a training accident causes a glitch in Chloe's powers, Max and Phoebe look for a cure. After Max thinks he's solved the issue, he allows Chloe to attend a party with friends, but his treatment creates brand new powers Chloe can't control.

programme.title: Danger Force
programme.desc: When Chapa's little sister needs her help during a city-wide blackout, the rest of Danger Force cross the line as they try to pull her back to power up the Man's Nest and help them win a contest.

programme.title: Henry Danger
